1�Is there still hope for mankind?There's always hope!Destiny is destiny...
1�So you're the one who saved me?
1�What? I'm supposed to give this to...?
1�So if Emptiness is reason, then our souls are filled with...!?
1�Shut up, you monster!Why would anyone want to live in your prison, anyway!?
1�How do you know we can't defeat the Emptiness!? Have you even tried?
1�Why would I be afraid of that?
1�I've survived beastman attacks, huge explosions, and the fall of Tavnazia. People can do anything if they don't give up hope!
1�Isn't that right,  ?
1�Were you able to locate the fugitive boy?
1�I must have searched the entire landscape surrounding this tower; however, I was unsuccessful in uncovering any trace of him...
1�All that remains is the area that lies ahead of.........!?
r?�What is the purpose of this place? What sort of dark rituals were performed here?
1�Hm? We are not alone!?
1�It cannot be! She is supposed to be resting in the infirmary in Jeuno!
1�And that boy...
1�The terrestrial avatar of dreams...Diabolos!?
1�Which can only mean...we are already inside his dream!
1�The blazing lifeforce of the avatar flows through my blade.
1�I, Tenzen, left my country in the Far East after hearing the warning of the avatars--the warning that the Keeper of the Apocalypse's return was imminent.
1�I have come here to request your assistance!
1�Of the five crystals, three have been overcome by the Emptiness...
1�Is it not the duty of the five terrestrial avatars to protect the crystals? Let us join in arms and defeat the enemy of light!
1�The voice of Emptiness...!?
..�Are you all right?
1�I was unable to stop the boy.
1�But for what reason was he here?And what is the truth behind the words of Diabolos?
1�Much is still unclear. I must return to Jeuno and find out if there is anything else that girl knows...
..�Are you all right?
1�I was unable to stop the boy.
1�But for what reason was he here?And what is the truth behind the words of Diabolos?
1�Much is still unclear. I must return to Jeuno and find out if there is anything else that girl knows...
!?�Traitors!There is no escape!
s!�That flame!? Phoenix!?
1�Battle the Emptiness...?
!?�Listen carefully, children of the dawn. Emptiness is not without reason. Its place is set in the eternal scheme of the universe.
1�And true reason is that which lies deep within your soul. Reason that makes you what you are.
1�To defy the will of the Twilight God is to defy reason. Any attempt to escape from Emptiness is futile.
1�Now that the Emptiness encroaches on your soul, you can hear its voice...and the voice that calls back...
1�...The voice of the Emptiness within you...
1�However, there is no need for despair.
1�Ten thousand years ago the Kuluu, too, lost all hope. It is then that I was born here, in the depths of their city.
1�I am the ruler of dreams, and within my dreams--within my kingdom of Dynamis--people can escape the harshness of reality.
1�Now come... Save yourselves while you still have the chance...Let go of all you know and enter my world, as have many others...
1�The realm of dreams is a paradise, free of pain and strife.
1�Fool...You have heard the voice of the Emptiness, so you are aware of what lies beyond my dreams.
1�Why...?Why do you remember what you saw in my world...?
1�It was I who led you to my realm...Or was it you who led me to yours...?
1�If that is true, then...
1�Who dares approach?
1�Leave this place. My power is for me, and me alone.
1�Your efforts are in vain, for this is nothing but a dream.
1�And that is why she continues to feed people false hopes, all the while forgetting the truths that lie in the battles fought ten thousand years ago...
1�Emptiness consumes the body, but the soul lives on--it lives on in my world.
1�I am the ruler of the subconscious plane. What you dream becomes my dream, and what I dream becomes your world. Now sleep...
1�So, Phoenix still remains unwhole...
1�If the Keeper of the Apocalypse truly is on his way, there is nothing left on Vana'diel for the children of Altana--nothing but annihilation.
1�And even so, you tell me you do not fear what you heard?
1�Oh my Gob! You're one of those adventurerurers, aren't ya?You got nothin' on me, ?[man./lady.] I was just mindin' my own businesesess, lookin' for junk an' stuff.
1�Hey, watch out. You don't wanna fight me. I'll turn you into meat jerky!Wait, how about you and me be friends instead? Sound good?
1�I travel all over the world and hear lots of differererent stories. I even hear your stories. I can tell you one, if you want.
1�Do you want to hear a story?No, thank you.Let's hear one.

1�What story would you like to be told?On second thought, maybe later.Darkness Named(pt.1).Darkness Named(pt.2).Darkness Named(pt.3).Waking Dreams(pt.1).Waking Dreams(pt.2).Waking Dreams(pt.3).Waking Dreams(pt.4).Waking Dreams(pt.5).Waking Dreams(pt.6).Waking Dreams(pt.7).Waking Dreams(pt.8).Waking Dreams(pt.9).Rhapsodies of Vana'diel.
1�Oh...Well, if that's the case, I'm outta here.
1�Oh...Well, if that's the case, I'm outta here.
1�Oh...Well, if that's the case, I'm outta here.
1�Oh...Well, if that's the case, I'm outta here.
1�Oh...Well, if that's the case, I'm outta here.
1�Now, listen close...
1�Diabolos...you pathetic weakling.
